programme.title: Blood, Sweat and Terrors
programme.desc: Nine blood-soaked tales of action and horror.

programme.title: Deadsight
programme.desc: A pregnant police officer and a blind man fight for their lives against swarms of the living dead.

programme.title: Nobody Gets Out Alive
programme.desc: Hunter's (Brian Gallagher) life turns upside down after his daughter is killed by a drunken driver. He disappears into the woods, and no one sees him for years -- until several partying teenagers are brutally killed one by one.

programme.title: Asmodexia
programme.desc: In Barcelona, an exorcist (Luís Marco) and his teenage granddaughter (Clàudia Pons) cast out demons while trying to elude the grasp of the cultists who are stalking them.

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Disturbing visions and her sister's disappearance lead a woman (Caity Lotz) to call a cop (Casper Van Dien) and a psychic to her childhood home.

programme.title: The Pact II
programme.desc: A woman plagued by nightmares of a serial killer learns her dreams have a horrifying connection to the real world.

programme.title: Puppet Master
programme.desc: Psychics (Paul Le Mat, Irene Miracle, Matt Roe) at a bay hotel meet the puppets Pin Head, Leech Woman, Tunneler, Blade and Jester.

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: Forced to live underground, survivors of an ice age embark on a mission to reach another outpost.

programme.title: Trick
programme.desc: A detective tries to track down a masked killer who reappears every Halloween to wreak bloody havoc.

programme.title: The Midnight Man
programme.desc: A girl plays a game with her friends and summons the creature known as the Midnight Man, who uses their worst fears against them.

programme.title: Wildling
programme.desc: After a childhood in captivity under the care of a man who taught her to fear the outside world, a young woman sees her new freedom shattered by a series of unsettling events.

programme.title: God's Country
programme.desc: A college professor gets drawn into an escalating battle of wills after she catches two hunters trespassing on her property in the remote mountains of the American West.

programme.title: Rent-a-Pal
programme.desc: A strange VHS tape allows a lonely bachelor named David to find companionship with Andy -- its charming and charismatic host. However, Andy's friendship comes at a cost, and David desperately struggles to afford the price of admission.

programme.title: Rogue Agent
programme.desc: Conman Robert Freegard poses as an undercover MI5 agent and kidnaps countless victims amidst a high-stakes manhunt, until the woman who fell for him brings him to justice.
